Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update conversion rates with verified transfer partners

- Delete all existing rates and insert only verified transfer partners

  (removed incorrect Aeroplan and Velocity)
- HSBC Rewards Points (SG): Updated KrisFlyer to 0.3333 (Jan 2025 devaluation)
- Membership Rewards (CA): Aeroplan, Avios (1:1), AsiaMiles, FlyingBlue (0.75)
  (no KrisFlyer - not a direct partner)
- Added DBS Points, UOB PRVI Miles, RBC Avion, Marriott Bonvoy

Sources: MileLion, Citi SG official site, Prince of Travel
